Text:
Quality was quite acceptable, and with my slow connection,  the size of the file was a great relief... :)

Keep it up! :)

/Manko
nice one m8 will  be waiting for the next episode. No need to hind behind the soffa!!!
Many thanks for this and the other episodes.   Picture quality is very good but I can't get the audio.   Anyone else had this problem?   Please advise, my kids are going crazy to watch these again.

Codec name:
0x0055(MP3) ID'd as MPEG-1 Layer 3

Bitrate:
192 kb/s (96/ch, stereo) VB

48000 Hz

Only odd thing is the Hz, might be issues with that if your audiocard is configured for 44100 Hz, but shouldn't be... Get the Fraunhofer MP3-codec, and I think you should be allright. Or configure your audiocard for 48000 Hz.
Sorted.   Burned to DVD.   Everybody happy.   Many thanks once again for an excellent upload.
what is the video codec on this? I can't seem to get it to work...
